## 📝 Perform

✏️ Address the case study **Saving Lives with Data Visualizations (A): Charts
in the Time of Cholera** (available in Moodle's case studies area). The
companion dataset to the case is available in the

 👓 **Supplemental readings:** Tufte, E. R. (1997). [*The Visual Display of Quantitative Information*][].

🤔 **Self-Reflection Exercise:** What are the opportunities and challenges in visualizing multidimensional
datasets that include temporal and geographic aspects? Consider how design
choices impact comprehension and decision-making in complex data scenarios and
contingent on audiences' background.
